The Columbus State University Scholarship is ongoing, for all interested students who want to go into Bachelor’s, or Master’s degree programs.

 

Brief about the Columbus State University: The Columbus State University, offers Scholarships for Master’s and Bachelor’s degrees.

Only schooling charges, Tuition disclaimer will be compensated, also Select your Permanent Site.

Summary of the Columbus State University:

Degree: Bachelors, Masters

Provided by: Columbus State University

Deadline:

Scholarship value: Only tuition fees, Tuition waiver

The Columbus State University, and the Center for International Education, are satisfied to bid the

International Student Facility Scholarship to qualified undergraduate and graduate international

students on an F-1 student visa. The International Student Facility Scholarship is an out-of-state

tuition disclaimer that is available to the restricted number of international students who have been recognized to CSU, or are presently joining CSU.

Eligibility principles for the International Student Amenities Scholarship:

  • It is open to all international students.
  • Candidates must hold an offer in any undergraduate or postgraduate sequence of schoolwork at the university.
  • Candidates must determine brilliant academic accomplishments.

Benefits of the International Student Services Scholarship:

Slightly Effective candidates of the International Student Amenities Scholarship will obtain an

out-of-state education defeat.

Limit of the International Student Amenities Scholarship,

The preceding period to apply for the International Student Facilities Scholarship is differs.

How to apply for The Columbus State University is as follows:

Entry Procedure

  1. Starting from the “apply now” tag, you will be absorbed to the futures website or click here.
  2. The uncertainty you have not generated a description before for another University Scheme of Georgia school, you will need to create a new account to relate to CSU.
  3. Complete the Columbus State University online request form for admission.
  4. Be certain to reply to all articles on the connected application to support in determining equally your entry and residency status.
  5. Subsequently, you are finished, connect the SUBMIT, and monitor the guidelines.
  6. There is no refillable application payment of $40 (American Express, Discover, MasterCard, or Visa).
